scripts.dev: yarn watch 'yarn build' src lib img fonts
scripts.build: yarn styles && yarn js && yarn img && yarn fonts
scripts.styles: yarn node-sass src/views -o build/styles && cat build/styles/**/styles.css > build/styles.css
scripts.js: yarn browserify -p common-shakeify -t strictify src -o build/game.js
scripts.min: yarn build && yarn min:js && yarn min:styles && yarn min:html
scripts.zip: rm -f build/game.zip && zip -9 build/game.zip build/game.min.js build/index.html build/retro-subset.woff2 build/styles.min.css build/img
